snippet.title: Ori and the Blind Forest Trailer
snippet.description:
Ori and the Blind Forest is an action-adventure platformer that combines deep exploratory gameplay with emotional storytelling.

Join Ori to solve the mysteries of a dying forest while escaping the evil clutches of Kuro, the dark owl.

Ori and the Blind Forest releases March 11, 2015.
